thread.title: Shia LaBeouf's anti-Trump museum exhibit is shut down | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Shia LaBeouf's anti-Trump museum exhibit is shut down | Daily Mail Online

author: Karen Ruiz For Dailymail.Com
title: Shia LaBeouf's anti-Trump museum exhibit is shut down | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Shia LaBeouf's anti-Trump museum exhibit is shut down after becoming a 'flashpoint for violence' Actor's art project was intended as a four-year protest against Trump and consisted of a 24-hour webcam under the words 'he will not divide us' But the camera has now been shut down by the Museum of Moving Images just three weeks after its launch The New York site had become a 'flashpoint for violence' and resulted in numerous arrests LaBeouf himself was arrested on January 25 after a physical altercation with a protester The actor screamed 'he will not divide us' into the face of a demonstrator at the site of the camera Published: 16:47 GMT, 10 February 2017 | Updated: 20:24 GMT, 10 February 2017 108 shares
